00028 #ifndef __OptimisedUtil_H__
00029 #define __OptimisedUtil_H__

00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00046     class _OgreExport OptimisedUtil
00047     {
00048     private:
00050         OptimisedUtil(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do nothing, should not use */
00052         OptimisedUtil& operator=(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do not use */
00053 
00054     protected:
00056         static OptimisedUtil* msImplementation;
00057 
00059         static OptimisedUtil* _detectImplementation(void);
00060 
00061     public:
00062         // Default constructor
00063         OptimisedUtil(void) {}
00064         // Destructor
00065         virtual ~OptimisedUtil() {}
00066 
00072         static OptimisedUtil* getImplementation(void) { return msImplementation; }
00073 
00098         virtual void softwareVertexSkinning(
00099             const float *srcPosPtr, float *destPosPtr,
00100             const float *srcNormPtr, float *destNormPtr,
00101             const float *blendWeightPtr, const unsigned char* blendIndexPtr,
00102             const Matrix4* const* blendMatrices,
00103             size_t srcPosStride, size_t destPosStride,
00104             size_t srcNormStride, size_t destNormStride,
00105             size_t blendWeightStride, size_t blendIndexStride,
00106             size_t numWeightsPerVertex,
00107             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00108 
00122         virtual void softwareVertexMorph(
00123             Real t,
00124             const float *srcPos1, const float *srcPos2,
00125             float *dstPos,
00126             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00127 
00137         virtual void concatenateAffineMatrices(
00138             const Matrix4& baseMatrix,
00139             const Matrix4* srcMatrices,
00140             Matrix4* dstMatrices,
00141             size_t numMatrices) = 0;
00142 
00154         virtual void calculateFaceNormals(
00155             const float *positions,
00156             const EdgeData::Triangle *triangles,
00157             Vector4 *faceNormals,
00158             size_t numTriangles) = 0;
00159 
00176         virtual void calculateLightFacing(
00177             const Vector4& lightPos,
00178             const Vector4* faceNormals,
00179             char* lightFacings,
00180             size_t numFaces) = 0;
00181 
00196         virtual void extrudeVertices(
00197             const Vector4& lightPos,
00198             Real extrudeDist,
00199             const float* srcPositions,
00200             float* destPositions,
00201             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00202     };

00208     template <class T>
00209     static FORCEINLINE T* rawOffsetPointer(T* ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00210     {
00211         return (T*)((char*)(ptr) + offset);
00212     }
00213 
00218     template <class T>
00219     static FORCEINLINE void advanceRawPointer(T*& ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00220     {
00221         ptr = rawOffsetPointer(ptr, offset);
00222     }
00226 }
